channel.title: Lethalscape
channel.description:
[b][i] Lethalscape, adventure to a new world [/b][/i]
Current coders/forum admins
Coder - Me Forum admin - Me Forum admin - Nwfd1025/Kyle
Currently looking for..
1 Invisionfree master to make the forums, erm pimp ^^
3 Forum mods
3 Ingame mods
2 Admins
1 Unique thinker
thanks.
The forums are a place to chill, find out recent updates, and meet new friends [url=http://z7.invisionfree.com/Lethalscape/index.php?act=idx]http://z7.invisionfree.com/Lethalscape/index.php?act=idx[/url]
Please register before you apply for a job with the Lethalscape team..
We are looking to make a truly amazing experiance for the players/staff/everyone! Lethalscape, adventure to a new world.
Application form
Name on forums: Do you have msn messenger: (Yes/no) Age: Kind of job: Experiance: Why do you think your right?:
Thanks. If you [B] DO NOT [/b] have Msn please dont apply, as we all need quick contact.
Current updates..
100 stat 127 cb Torso mini-game White mini-game Barrows mini-game Pirate mini-game Karils xbow fully working with bolts Massive shopping maul Kq lair Starting place remains hidden ^^ Made a beta Made a client Added head icons to client Made prayer boost your stats to 120 if your 100 ect.. So getting 31 pray and using ulti str = 120 str if your 100 until it drains.
And alot more to come, thanks.
IF YOU APPLY AND ARE NOT DEDICATED YOU WILL BE REMOVED FROM THE TEAM.

item.title: Lethalscape
item.dc:creator: @ScimmyScape ScimmyScape
item.description:
@ScimmyScape wrote:

Hmm, I might join

Name on forums: Applying atm, it’ll be Ashley or R 4 N G 3.

Do you have msn messenger: (Yes/no) Yes, Read my sig. ^^

Age: 15.

Kind of job: Admin / Forum Mod / (If you need a hoster.)

Experiance: Ermm… I’ve been admin on too many servers, i’m trying to look for one server to truley stick to, and stay on. Made ScimmyScape v.1 / v.2 it was fun. Quit making servers for now though.

Why do you think your right?: Hmm… I can be active for around 2 hours - 6 hours, lol. Plus i’m down to earth and don’t take peoples sides when it comes down to banning / muting.
~Ashley.

Read full topic

item.title: Lethalscape
item.dc:creator: @JxS JxS
item.description:
@JxS wrote:

Name on forums: Moparisthebest
Do you have msn messenger: (Yes/no) No, I’m an IRC person
Age: ~35, I lost track while working on cars.
Kind of job: I like to keep quiet about that ;), if ya know what I mean. KEKEKE.
Experiance: I like to work on cars
Why do you think your right?: Because I spend less than one minute on computers per day, and this project seems to require about the same amount of time to complete.

Read full topic
